description: Retrieve artifact from Artifactory using GAVC

version.description: The artifact version used for Artifactory auth

group.description: The artifact group used for Artifactory GAVC search

repository.description: The artifact repository used for Artifactory GAVC search

deploy_location.description: Destination location to place artifact on system

artifactory_host.description: The hostname Artifactory is accessible from

apitoken.description: The API token used for artifactory
